communicationActivity.details: Plow vs Car with no injuries. The plow is damaged and the other vehicle is undrivable. Blocking both lanes, but in different spots so traffic is getting by. He will do traffic control. 9P2 en route.

communicationActivity.details: Can plow move out of his lane. No, it is a bad corner and the plow is providing advance warning for traffic control. CSP en route with drive time from Denver/Golden area.
